title: Architecture Irreversibility Model: Thresholds, Cascades, and Expected Loss
description: A quantitative model for irreversible transitions in complex architectures. The repository provides a reproducible simulation framework demonstrating threshold crossings, dependency-driven cascades, and expected economic loss on fully synthetic data. This is a public showcase and research artifact; no proprietary calibration or consulting logic is included.
notes: This repository is intended for publication, citation, and demonstration purposes. Operational tooling, questionnaires, calibration procedures, and commercial artifacts are maintained in a separate private repository.
